name: AWS EIP disassociate
description: Remove the association between an Elastic IP address and a server.

instance_id.label: AWS Instance ID
instance_id.description: (Optional) AWS instance-id the EIP is currently associated with.  Can be used to ensure IP is where you think it is.  If not specified, blindly removes association without checking.

ip_address.label: Elastic IP
ip_address.description: The Elastic IP address to disassociate.
